property.name: yarn.admin.acl
property.description: ACL of who can be admin of the YARN cluster

property.name: yarn.log-aggregation-enable
property.description: Whether to enable log aggregation (default false).

property.name: yarn.log-aggregation.retain-seconds
property.description: How long to keep aggregation logs before deleting them, -1 disabled (default -1).

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.resource.memory-mb
property.description: The amount of physical memory, in MB, that can be allocated for containers (default 8192)

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.resource.cpu-vcores
property.description: Number of CPU cores that can be allocated for containers (default 8)

property.name: yarn.scheduler.minimum-allocation-mb
property.description: The minimum allocation for every container request at the RM, in MBs (default 1024)

property.name: yarn.scheduler.maximum-allocation-mb
property.description: The maximum allocation for every container request at the RM, in MBs (default 8192)

property.name: yarn.scheduler.minimum-allocation-vcores
property.description: The minimum allocation for every container request at the RM, in terms of virtual CPU cores (default 1)

property.name: yarn.scheduler.maximum-allocation-vcores
property.description: The maximum allocation for every container request at the RM, in terms of virtual CPU cores (default 32)

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.pmem-check-enabled
property.description: Whether physical memory limits will be enforced for containers (default true).

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.vmem-check-enabled
property.description: Whether virtual memory limits will be enforced for containers (default true).

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.vmem-pmem-ratio
property.description: Ratio between virtual memory to physical memory when setting memory limits for containers (default 2.1).

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.log.retain-seconds
property.description: Time in seconds to retain user logs. Only applicable if log aggregation is disabled (default 10800).
